translation.ko: 늙어가는 아빠 팬들한테 쓰레기 음식으로 바가지 씌워요?

translation.en: I have bigger dreams than that.
Oh, shit, Ben. I've heard your dreams.
Even if you did have multiple dicks,
no one's gonna suck them more than one at a time.
translation.ko: 동시에 하나 이상 빨아줄 사람은 없어

translation.en: You know what? I'm not gonna do this. Not here. Not in my restaurant.
translation.ko: 더는 못 들어주겠다 내 레스토랑에서 나가

translation.en: This is a classy family restaurant, you dickhead.
translation.ko: 여긴 고급 패밀리 레스토랑이야 이 존만아

translation.en: If you're not gonna give me the money, then I'm gonna go to my wife and beg her.
translation.ko: 아빠가 돈 안 주면 아내한테 가서 빌 거예요

translation.en: Ex-wife!
And leave that poor woman alone, all right? She's been through enough.
translation.ko: 그 불쌍한 애 좀 내버려 둬 고생은 시킬 만큼 시켰어

translation.en: Oh, Shannon, you should see these two horses fuck each other.
translation.ko: 섀넌, 저 말 두 마리가 교미하는 거 봐

translation.en: It reminds me of our first date
when we watched those horses fucking each other.
That was so funny.
You know what was funny?
I pretended your dick wasn't tiny our entire marriage.
translation.ko: 난 결혼 생활 내내 네 자지가 작지 않은 척했어

translation.en: Oh, that was fun.
Look, until I sign the divorce papers, you're still my wife,
translation.ko: 내가 이혼 서류에 서명하기 전까지 넌 내 아내인데 내 절친과 만나

translation.en: and you're dating my best friend.
translation.ko: 넌 내 아내인데 내 절친과 만나

translation.en: I think it's pretty awesome that I'm cool with that.
translation.ko: 쿨하게 받아들이는 내가 꽤 멋지다고 생각해

translation.en: I don't give a fuck what you're cool with. That's why I left you, loser.
translation.ko: 쿨하든가 말든가 그래서 널 떠난 거야, 루저야

translation.en: Shannon, honey, look at me.
I'm a desperate man.
I need $415 today,
or I lose my job and everything I've ever worked for.
translation.ko: 내 일자리와 공들였던 모든 걸 잃어

translation.en: Help me out, please!
Being a basketball coach is all I've ever dreamed of.
translation.ko: 난 농구 코치 외에는 다른 꿈이 없었어

translation.en: Actually, know what this reminds me of?
If you say the words, "Little Man Tate," I swear to God...
translation.ko: 만약 '꼬마 천재 테이트' 운운하면 나 정말...

translation.en: You remember how Little Man Tate tripped on his own feet a bunch of times
translation.ko: '꼬마 천재 테이트'가 여러 번 좌절을 겪었던 거 알지?

translation.en: before you realize his gift of just being a little man
translation.ko: 그러다가 테이트의 몸에 갇힌 꼬마 천재란 걸

translation.en: stuck in a Tate's body?
Ben, I'm not giving you any money.
translation.ko: 벤, 난 한 푼도 못 줘

translation.en: We are not getting back together,
and I hate to break it to you, but Little Man Tate sucks.
translation.ko: 이런 말까지 하긴 싫지만 '꼬마 천재 테이트' 극혐이야

translation.en: Thanks, Scott. There's a lot here. This really helps.
We don't want you to lose your job, Coach. We love this team.
translation.ko: 감독님 잘리면 안 돼요 우린 이 팀을 사랑한다고요

translation.en: Scott, I don't know what to say.
Next! Who else has got money for Coach?
Here, Coach. This is my monthly stipend for Weight Watchers.
translation.ko: 여기요, 감독님 웨이트워처스 한 달 월급이에요

translation.en: You have a stipend for Weight Watchers? I thought it was just a meal plan.
translation.ko: 너 웨이트워처스에서 월급 받아? 다이어트 식단 파는 곳 아냐?

translation.en: Oh, Coach. It's so much more than that.
They moved away from points, and it's been transformative.
Look, I'll tell you what I told the only woman I ever loved.
translation.ko: 내 인생 유일한 사랑에게 했던 얘기가 있어

translation.en: "You are beautiful just how you are, and you don't need bigger titties."
translation.ko: '넌 지금 그대로 아름다워 가슴 더 키우지 않아도 돼'

translation.en: Thanks, Coach.
Here you go, Coach. I stole this from my little brother.
You could pawn it. Probably get a hundred bucks.
Thank you, Timebomb. This is great.
When your little brother learns to talk, tell him, "Thanks."
translation.ko: 네 동생이 말을 배우면 고맙다고 전해줘

translation.en: This is all my bar mitzvah money, Coach. I want you to have it.
translation.ko: 유대교 성년식 때 받은 돈 전부 감독님 가져요

translation.en: Thanks, Isaac. Although you know what?
I deserve this money for sitting through that fucking thing.
translation.ko: 그 망할 행사에 참석했었으니까 난 이 돈 받아도 돼

translation.en: Shit music.
Horrible food.
Silly hats.
I did like the chair thing though.
Oh, and by the way,
didn't they say at the end of that thing you'd become a man?
translation.ko: 그날 행사가 끝나면 넌 남자가 된다며?

translation.en: When the fuck is that gonna happen?
Technically, it has happened.
My parents give me 20 bucks every time I get an "A,"
and I've invested wisely in Bitcoin.
Well, thankfully, if you include the firearm,
I already have the $415 here, so we don't need your space money.
translation.ko: 이미 415달러가 모여서 네 장난감 돈은 필요 없어

translation.en: Great. I'll just hold on to it
until the global economy inevitably collapses.
translation.ko: 세계 경제가 폭락할 때까지 기다려 볼게요

translation.en: So you got the money! Everything's gonna work out, right?
translation.ko: 돈 모으셨으니 이제 아무 걱정 없겠죠?

translation.en: [Ben] This is not where I wanted to be at this stage in my life.
translation.ko: 이 나이에 이따위로 살고 싶진 않았어

translation.en: Offering illegal sex to an underage kid to help my career.
translation.ko: 내 일자리 구하자고 미성년자에게 불법 섹스를 권하다니

translation.en: I had so many plans.
I wanna walk in a room and have people know who I am.
translation.ko: 어딜 가면 모든 사람이 날 알아주길 바랐어

translation.en: I wanna turn heads.
I'm sick of being anonymous!
[Connie] Great speech, Ben.
-[bones crack] -How tall do you say this kid is?
Seven feet.
You might want to stretch.
Coach! Oh, great. He knows where I live.
translation.ko: 감독님? 대박이네 내가 어디 사는지 알잖아?

translation.en: Dog, you gotta stop creeping on me. I told you I don't wanna play basketball.
translation.ko: 이봐요, 이제 슬슬 무섭네요 농구 안 한다고 말했잖아요

translation.en: [Connie] Yo! Am I fucking this kid or not?
translation.ko: 야, 쟤랑 떡 치냐, 안 치냐?

translation.en: As you can see, I've kept my end of the bargain.
Who is that?
Connie. She's a woman of the night.
She's not a ten but a solid six.
Five maybe. Four at the worst.
translation.ko: 10점 만점은 아니어도 꽉 찬 6점이나 5점은 돼 빡빡하게 보면 4점

translation.en: But what are you? A three? You should be so fucking lucky.
translation.ko: 근데 넌 3점이나 되냐? 운 좋은 줄 알아

translation.en: Here, I got you some Magnums.
You're a tall son of a bitch,
so even if you've got a below-average schlong,
I'm betting it's still pretty big.
Now me, I was supposed to be tall, but my mom's short.
translation.ko: 난 원래 키가 컸어야 하는데 엄마가 작아

translation.en: My dad's got a python, but unfortunately, I got my mom's dick.
translation.ko: 아빠는 구렁이만 한데 불운하게도 난 엄마 고추를 닮았지

translation.en: Do you know you're talking out loud?
Yeah, Matty. It's called recruiting.
Coach, seriously, you gotta stop.
No, I'll never stop, Matty, because we need you on this team, kid.
translation.ko: 아니, 그만 못 해 우리 팀엔 네가 꼭 필요해

translation.en: And I'm here for you.
And that's what being a coach is all about.
So you wanna pork this chick or what?
How about an HJ?
Her pricing's crazy. I can get you a really good deal.
translation.ko: 가격이 이상한데 내가 대박 깎아줄 수 있어

translation.en: -Coach, I don't think that's gonna happen. -Why not? I got her right here.
translation.ko: - 감독님, 그건 힘들겠어요 - 왜? 저기 기다리고 있어

translation.en: Oh, shit! Connie, don't tell 'em nothing!
translation.ko: 제기랄, 코니, 아무 말도 하지 마!

translation.en: I didn't. All I told 'em was you gave me 500 bucks to have sex with a kid.
translation.ko: 안 했어 애랑 섹스하는 대가로 500달러 받았단 말 빼곤

translation.en: That's everything!
You'll regret this, buddy.
My dad owns a restaurant.
[man] Good luck on Saturday, Coach.
I'm so grateful that nobody fucked me in there!
Sure, my ego's hurt a little, but nonetheless, thank you, God.
Shan, whatever you're gonna say, I deserve it.
translation.ko: 섀넌, 네가 뭐라고 해도 난 할 말이 없어

translation.en: This is the lowest of the low.
The lowest I've been since that time nobody tried to butt-fuck me in prison
translation.ko: 몇 시간 전 감옥에서 아무도 내 후장을 안 노릴 때보다 더 끔찍한 참사

translation.en: a couple of hours ago.
translation.ko: 아무도 내 후장을 안 노릴 때보다 더 끔찍한 참사

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my job, Shannon, and it's all my fault.
translation.ko: 난 일자리를 잃을 거야 전부 내 잘못이지

translation.en: I can't believe I spent the team's money on a prostitute for Matty.
translation.ko: 아이들 돈을 받아 매티한테 붙일 매춘부를 사다니

translation.en: You had those kids buy another kid a prostitute?
translation.ko: 애들 시켜서 다른 애한테 매춘부를 붙였어?

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Shannon! Are you even listening to me?
translation.ko: 왜 이래, 섀넌 내가 말하면 안 듣니?

translation.en: I didn't have kids buy a prostitute.
translation.ko: 애들을 시켜서 매춘부를 붙인 게 아니라

translation.en: I bought the prostitute for a kid with money from other kids.
translation.ko: 매춘부는 내가 붙이고 돈만 애들한테 받았어

translation.en: You're a pervert.
If you could sing or act, they'd make documentaries about you.
translation.ko: 네가 가수나 배우였다면 너에 관한 다큐가 나왔을걸?

translation.en: Shan, I'm pouring my heart out here.
I can't even talk to you anymore.
translation.ko: 네가 이런 식이면 이제 얘기 못 해

translation.en: You focus on all the wrong shit.
My dream just died.
I have nothing... except for you.
translation.ko: 난 다 잃었어 - 너만 빼고 - 아니!

translation.en: [Shannon] No!
You have nothing.
-Can I help you, sir? -Yeah.
Do you have something for a man whose dreams just died,
translation.ko: 방금 꿈 상 당한 사람을 위한 옷이 있나요?

translation.en: and now he's got to work at his dad's boring-ass basketball-themed steakhouse
translation.ko: 이제 아빠가 하는 한심한 농구 테마 레스토랑에서

translation.en: for the rest of his life?
Usually, the "I hate my dad" clothes are for women,
but I'm sure we can find something.
Follow me!
You know, I should at least say goodbye to the guys.
Where the heck have you been? The game's about to start.
translation.ko: 대체 어디 갔었어? 경기가 곧 시작해

translation.en: The school board is getting antsy.
I assumed I was fired.
I couldn't get Matty to play, and I was arrested for gettin' a hooker.
translation.ko: 매티를 못 데려왔고 성 매수로 체포까지 당했죠

translation.en: You got arrested?
Uh... If you didn't hear about it, then, uh, no, I didn't get arrested.
translation.ko: 모르고 계셨다면 체포는 없었던 걸로 하죠

translation.en: Well, listen, Ben.
I tried everything I could, but I think it would be best
if you just put your resignation letter on my desk by tomorrow...
is what I would be saying if you didn't get Matty.
translation.ko: 매티를 못 데려오면 그렇게 말하려고 했지

translation.en: Wait. What are you talking about?
I'm saying you got Matty. Was that not clear?
translation.ko: 매티가 왔다는 말씀이지 내 말이 어려웠어?

translation.en: I'm trying to be more fun. He's right over there.
translation.ko: 나름 재미있게 한 건데 매티 저기 있어

translation.en: Holy shit!
Opal, you're right. That was way more fun!
translation.ko: 교장 선생님 말이 맞아요! 훨씬 재미있네요!

translation.en: I like it! I like it. You did a good job!
What the hell are you doing here, friend?
Did Connie throw you a free one? That's why she's the best.
translation.ko: 코니가 공짜로 해줬어? 걔가 그래서 최고라니까

translation.en: Heart of gold, that woman.
No, but what you did yesterday
was the nicest thing anyone's ever done for me.
Failing to get you a hooker was the nicest thing anyone ever did for you?
translation.ko: 매춘부 연결해 주려다 실패한 게 최고의 호의였다고?

translation.en: Kid, you need better friends.
It just showed that you really wanted me here.
You know, no one in my entire life has ever wanted me anywhere.
translation.ko: 평생 아무도 저를 그렇게 원하지 않았죠

translation.en: You know, my dad left when I was--
Boring! You're here. That's what matters.
Matty, you're part of the team now,
and we take care of each other here.
I'm always gonna be there for ya.
Now, are we just gonna stand here and jerk each other off,
or are we gonna get out there and play some Colt basketball?
-Time-out! Did you see that? -[whistle blows]
We won the tip.
We won the fucking tip!
We haven't won a tip in eight years!
It's a new day in Lenwood, you fuckers!
Yeah. [laughing]
You motherfuckers thought I couldn't do it.
translation.ko: 당신네들은 내가 못 할 줄 알았지?

translation.en: But the great Coach Hopkins proved you wrong.
translation.ko: 하지만 위대한 홉킨스 감독님이 당신들의 오답을 증명했노라!

translation.en: Wrong! Wrong! Wrong! Wrong!
Right.
No one can take this moment away from me.
translation.ko: 이 순간은 누구에게도 빼앗기지 않을 거야

translation.en: The fucking tip, motherfuckers, with a seven-foot fucking giant.
You're outta here!
Whatever you want.
I don't care, Greg.
Usually, that'd make me go nuts,
but you're looking at a whole new Coach Hopkins.
I got my player. I got my job. I'm about to get my beautiful wife back.
translation.ko: 선수를 구했고 직장을 지켰고 예쁜 아내도 되찾을 거야

translation.en: And my dad?
He can go fuck his restaurant with all my dicks.
translation.ko: 그까짓 레스토랑 알아서 해 처먹으라고 해

translation.en: I'm sorry I let you down, Coach.
Let me down? We only lost by 16 points thanks to you.
translation.ko: 실망? 네 덕분에 겨우 16점 차이로 졌어

translation.en: I can't remember the last time we got that close.
translation.ko: 그만큼 따라간 게 언제였나 기억도 안 나

translation.en: The school board saw some real progress.
Well, I guess I didn't hate it as much as I thought.
Plus, it was pretty exciting when that cheerleader gave birth.
translation.ko: 게다가 치어리더가 아기 낳을 땐 진짜 쫄깃했죠

translation.en: It sure was, wasn't it?
The magic of basketball.
Coach, I... I gotta say this feels like a family here, you know?
translation.ko: 감독님, 여기 오니까 가족이 생긴 기분이에요

translation.en: And I need that because... after my dad left, my mom had to work some crazy--
translation.ko: 제겐 그게 필요했죠 아빠가 떠나고 엄마는 힘겹...

translation.en: Boring! Sorry, the story was just really boring.
translation.ko: 지루해! 미안한데 그 얘기 진짜 지루하다

translation.en: No, I get it. It was... It was pretty boring. You're right.
translation.ko: 알아요, 너무 지루했죠 감독님 말씀이 맞아요

translation.en: Matty, come here, you tall, lanky weirdo.
I gotta say, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship,
translation.ko: 이 말은 해야겠다 '이게 아름다운 우정의 시작 같아'

translation.en: and that right there is a quote from Little Man Tate.
I think.
[Ben] It didn't download properly. I never got to see the whole movie.
translation.ko: 다운로드가 되다 말아서 영화를 끝까지 못 봤거든
